description: This course is a continuation of Chemistry 247 topics. Chemistry 248 delves into the chemistry of functional groups, especially those that play a role in the reactivity of biomolecules such as carbohydrates, lipids, proteins ,and nucleic acids. Together, Chemistry 247 and 248 provide a full treatment of introductory organic chemistry. Prerequisite: Chemistry 247 or permission of instructor. Offered annually in the spring semester. Counts toward environmental studies major (natural science track).
name: Organic Chemistry II
notes: Students in Chem 248 must also register for one Chem 254 lab.
prerequisites: Chemistry 247 or permission of instructor. Offered annually in the spring semester. Counts toward environmental studies major (natural science track).
